General.Name: Teradata Corp
General.Description: Teradata Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides a connected hybrid cloud analytics and data platform in the United States and internationally. The company operates in two segments, Product Sales and Consulting Services. It offers Teradata Vantage, an open and connected platform designed to leverage data across an enterprise. The company's consulting services include support services for organizations to establish a data analytics and AI/ML vision, enable a hybrid ecosystem architecture, and identify and operationalize opportunities. It offers support and maintenance services. The company serves clients in financial services, government, healthcare and life sciences, public, manufacturing, retail, telecommunications, and travel/transportation sectors through a direct sales force. Teradata Corporation was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in San Diego, California.
General.Address: 17095 Via Del Campo, San Diego, CA, United States, 92127
